job_history.work_description: Partner with Product Management and Purchasing Team in determining financial impact due to product cost reductions, new product roll out, etc. Performed financial statement audits of security broker dealers for purposes of SEC/FINRA purposes. Completed monthly, quarterly and annual bank reconciliations for 11 small companies.

Determine the hiring needs of the store, interview prospects, and bring on board store associates that will work courteously, efficiently, and effectively to meet the store's operational goals. Developed and managed annual operating budgets for 4 locations in the division.

Enhance the operational procedure, systems and principles in the areas of information flow and management, business processes and enhanced management reporting. Organize and intensify efficiency support services by ameliorating functions and coordinating communication between businesses and support functions.

Increased profits by 20% in first year, resulting in one of the best possible ROI's. Cut cost of goods sold by 13% by negotiating lower freight rates and increasing standards of product quality. Identified need for comprehensive business management solutions.

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Partnered with Product Management and Purchasing Team in determining financial impact due to product cost reductions, and performed financial statement audits, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Completed monthly, quarterly and annual bank reconciliations for 11 small companies, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Developed and managed annual operating budgets for 4 locations in the division, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held various leadership roles including District Manager, Operations Manager, and General Manager, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Management
skills.explanation: Managed annual operating budgets, hiring needs, and store associates, showing expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Coordinated communication between businesses and support functions, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Identified need for comprehensive business management solutions and increased profits by 20% in first year, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Cost Management
skills.explanation: Cut cost of goods sold by 13% by negotiating lower freight rates and increasing standards of product quality, indicating strong proficiency.
